query_history: jq '[ .[] | select(.filename != "Personal Tasks.md" and .filename != "Readings.md" and .filename != "Organizing Tasks.md") | select( .due and .due <= "2024-10-11" and .completed == false ) ] | sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and (.tags | index("#important")) and (.tags | index("#main") | not) and (.tags | index("#res" ) | not)) ] | sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and .start==null and .due==null and (.tags | index("#main"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and .due!=null and (.tags | index("#important"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and (.start!=null or .due!=null) and (.tags | index("#main"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and (.start!=null or .due!=null) and (.tags | index("#main"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and (.start!=null or .due!=null) and (.tags | index("#main"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and .due!=null and (.tags | index("#important"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'

jq '[ .[] | select(.filename != "Personal Tasks.md" and .filename != "Readings.md" and .filename != "Organizing Tasks.md") | select( .due and .due <= "2024-10-11" and .completed == false ) ] | sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and (.tags | index("#important")) and (.tags | index("#main") | not) and (.tags | index("#res" ) | not)) ] | sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and .start==null and .due==null and (.tags | index("#main"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and .due!=null and (.tags | index("#important"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'
jq '[ .[] | select(.status!="done" and (.start!=null or .due!=null) and (.tags | index("#main"))) ] |  sort_by(.due)'

query_list.description: select by tag with due date (undone)
